name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powertools - Powerful key commands, features, and tools for your browser

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful key commands, features, and tools for your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powertools

Take your browsing to the next level with Powertools – the ultimate Chrome extension for power users. Boost productivity, simplify your workflow, and unlock powerful shortcuts that transform the way you use your browser!

Features:  
Alt / Option + D: Duplicates the current tab. 
Quickly duplicate your current tab and streamline multitasking like a pro.  

More to Come:  
Powertools is constantly evolving! We’re dedicated to bringing you more features and shortcuts to supercharge your browsing experience.  

Simplify your browsing with Powertools. Whether you're a productivity junkie or just want more control over your browser, this extension is your new best friend. Have ideas or feedback? Contact us here: https://itwcreativeworks.com/contact.
